lines: provides high quality, standard combination print
used to mount flexographic print plates
3m cushion-mount plus plate mounting tape e1020, white, 27 in x 25 yd (686 mm x 22.86 m), 20 mil (0.5 mm), 1 roll/case
white, flexo plate mounting tape with air release feature
this family of 3m foam mounting tapes provides excellent print quality for process, combination, and solid printing, and offers a complete range of foam densities.
the tape has excellent holding power on-press with high plate side adhesion and clean plate removal when demounting
this product also has the air release feature adhesive with easy plate side removal and high plate side adhesion
the 3m cushion-mount plus plate mounting tape e1020 is a white, double coated foam tape that is 0.020 inch (0.51 mm) and has the air release feature adhesive with easy plate side removal.
high plate side adhesion used to mount flexographic print plates
the 3m cushion-mount plus plate mounting tape e1020 provides a high quality, standard combination print for use in mounting flexographic print plates to cylinders or sleeves
